sourcesContent:
<template>
  <a-modal
    style="top:0px;"
    :width="1600"
    v-model="showIframe"
    cancelText="直接退出,不会保存⛔"
    okText="以保存，点这里退出✔"
    @ok="handleSubmit"
    :closable="false"
    :maskClosable="false"
    :keyboard="false"
  >
    <iframe :src="cmdSrc" ref="iframe" scrolling="no" height="830px" width="100%" frameborder="0"></iframe>
  </a-modal>
</template>
<script>
import { addData, queryData } from '@/api/common'
import { STable } from '@/components'
export default {
  name: 'TableList',
  components: {
    STable
  },
  data() {
    return {
      confirmLoading: false,
      form: this.$form.createForm(this),
      showIframe: false,
      // cmdSrc: 'http://robot.lovechuangchuang.com:8084/robot.html'
      cmdSrc: 'http://192.168.1.110:9000/robot.html'
      // cmdSrc: 'http://localhost:8000/robot.html'
    }
  },
  methods: {
    // 打开网页传值
    show(title, mapId, cmd) {
      let user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user')) //用户id
      let param =
        '?orgId=' +
        user.orgId +
        '&createBy=' +
        user.id +
        '&circulation=1' +
        '&mapId=' +
        mapId +
        '&title=' +
        title +
        '&cmd=' +
        cmd
      this.cmdSrc = this.cmdSrc + encodeURI(param)
      console.log(this.cmdSrc)
      this.showIframe = true
    },
    //右下角确定事件
    handleSubmit() {
      let cmd = this.$refs.iframe.contentWindow.document.getElementById('cmd').innerHTML
      console.log(this.$refs.iframe.contentWindow.document.getElementById('cmd'))
      // let cmdName = this.$refs.iframe.contentWindow.document.getElementById('cmdName').innerHTML
      console.log('----------确定以后的值，待接收' + cmd)
      if (cmd == 0) {
        this.$message.error('请先点击保存')
      } else {
        this.$emit('getCmdId', cmd)
        this.showIframe = false
      }
    }
  }
}
</script>
<style>
</style>
